thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Start Of Construction Works Of The Seventh Building Of Kristina Houses

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Start Of Construction Works Of The Seventh Building Of Kristina Houses
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Pro Kapital Grupp As:
* START OF CONSTRUCTION WORKS OF THE SEVENTH BUILDING OF KRISTINA HOUSES
* SAYS OÃœ MARSI ELU AND NORDECON AS CONCLUDED CONTRACT FOR CONSTRUCTION OF 4 RESIDENTIAL BUILDINGS
* SAYS PLANNED COMPLETION OF WORKS IS APRIL 2019 AND PRICE OF CONSTRUCTION IS CA 2,8 MILLION EUR WITH VAT
* SAYS PLANNED REVENUE FROM 7TH BUILDING IS CA 5,1 MILLION EUROS WITH VAT. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
